/visitor 
"a non-logged in person visiting the website"

/user
"a logged in person visiting website"

/caretaker
"someone who is an employee or a volunteer at the petting zoo"

/admin
"the site administrator"

/ticket
"an incident report generated by a user or a caretaker"

/animal species
"a species of animal"

/animal
"a specific animal"

/petting zoo
"a place where people can come visit and watch or pet animals"

/1 story point
"create a working add button for a new entity"*
This includes backend, and frontend.
